text: Tiago André Ramos da Mota (born 20 May 1987) is a Portuguese football player who plays for SG Sacavenense. ==Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Oriental on 9 August 2014 in a game against Santa Clara. ==References== ==External links== *Tiago Mota at ZeroZero * Category:1987 births Category:Sportspeople from Lisbon Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Clube Oriental de Lisboa players Category:Campeonato de Portugal (league) players Category:LigaPro players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Tiago Mota (footballer, born 1987)
